content: handle skip 14 sts and work single_crochet in next 35sts 50 single_crochet around nylon rope only 2nd handle skip 14 sts and work single_crochet in next 17 sts see picture 6 bind off 6 closure 7 work 8 single_crochet into the center 8 sts below one of the handles see picture 7 row 1-8 ch2 double_crochet across row 9 ch1 decrease single_crochet ch5* skip 2 sts single_crochet decrease row 10 ch1 decrease sc10 into chain decrease bind off attach the button below the opposite handle * make sure the chain fits over your button adjust number of chain sts if necessary finishing cut nylon rope and secure ends by burning and gently pushing them together to seal weave in all ends copyright ©2019 ariane gallizzi this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only do not copy distribute or sell it in any format copyright ©2019 ariane gallizzi stitch npaste@gmail com page 3
